title: Woman's Skirt Length
description:
woman\'s skirt length, cotton, indigo dye, African XXc stored in box; dims 49-1/2 x 29\'; stored w/ 85.125.3,9,12
Narrowband, handwoven, indigo dyed.  Name of Cloth: Sarkousou or straight line.  Supposedly fashionable as a design before the coming of white people.  Size suggests a wrapper for a young child.
